title: Life Time’s New Coldwater Trail MTB & Run Brings Leadville Vibes to Alabama
content:
Life Time just dropped a big Autumn gift for endurance athletes in the Southeast—the Coldwater Trail MTB & Run, set for October 24-25 in Anniston, Alabama. Nestled in the growing Coldwater Mountain Trail System, this event is more than just another trail race—it’s the latest qualifier for the Leadville Trail 100 MTB & Run, bringing serious mountain bike and trail-running prestige to the region.

Why Coldwater?

Coldwater Mountain is slowly becoming an outdoor destination. Sitting on over 4,000 acres of prime Alabama backcountry, this trail network has gone from a regional favorite to a full-blown bucket list spot for mountain bikers and trail runners. With Life Time stepping in, it’s getting a marquee event to match its growing reputation.

The Coldwater Trail MTB & Run Offers Something for Everyone:

  • 50K and 100K MTB courses – A mix of fast flow, technical rock gardens, and classic singletrack.
  • 15K and 50K trail runs – Rolling forest terrain with just enough challenge to keep it spicy.

And the best part? Qualifier! It all feeds into Life Time’s legendary Leadville Race Series. If you’re gunning for a spot in the Leadville Trail 100 MTB presented by Kenetik or the Leadville Trail 100 Run presented by La Sportiva, this is now your best shot in the eastern U.S.

A Community-Driven Trail System Goes Big

The magic of Coldwater isn’t just in the dirt—it’s in the people. The local Northeast Alabama Bicycle Association (NEABA) and the City of Anniston have poured over $4 million into developing the area’s trails, working alongside Innovate Alabama to build out infrastructure that could cement Coldwater as the go-to mountain biking and trail-running hub of the Southeast.

“Over the last few years, we’ve been searching for the perfect Southeast venue for a new Leadville qualifier, and we found that in Anniston,” says Kimo Seymour, President of Media and Events at Life Time. “The dedication from this community and the quality of the trails made it an easy choice.”

More Than a Race—A Weekend of Adventure

It’s not just about hammering through miles of dirt. Life Time ensures the Coldwater Trail MTB & Run is a full-blown festival weekend. Expect:

  • Live music
  • Local food vendors
  • Family-friendly events
  • Chill outdoor vibes with plenty of Southern hospitality

This is it if you’re looking for a race that blends world-class trails, a shot at Leadville, and a killer weekend experience.

How to Sign Up

Registration is NOW OPEN

Hit up www.coldwatertrailrace.com for race details and the weekend schedule, and grab your spot before it sells out. Follow along on Instagram for updates, and start training—because Coldwater is about to become your new favorite race destination.
